author: kdlong
body:
#### PR description:

Adds the GenVertex position and time to NanoAOD

#### PR validation:

Tested that this works on the UL MC

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Backport of #32008, needed for NanoAOD v8 production
title: Backport #32008: GenVetex addition to Nano
